title: Ticket #1414: <SUBSYS>_USERID is undocumented
description:
commit 9bcfd76ee98a7e24e96fc34f017e0e2329fdf030
Author: thain <thain>
Date:   Wed Jun 26 16:19:33 2002 +0000

    Added two config items:
      DAEMON_USERID = The userid under which a daemon should run
      DAEMON_ADMIN_EMAIL = The person to receive notices about a particular daemon.

The Master has a <SUBSYS>_USERID config param specifying the user that <SUBSYS> is started under.
remarks:
2010-May-20 11:49:45 by smoler:
Another ticket that was misleadingly incorrect.

This variable was already documented: 06b67d5bdd276ec66b80d6ccb2565ce217140de8

The other variable, correctly identified as <SUBSYS>_ADMIN_EMAIL was not documented, but it is now.

2010-May-20 11:53:35 by matt:
Where's the documentation in the 7.4 manual?

http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.4/Index.html
check_ins: 2010-May-20 11:43   Check-in [25498]: documented knob <SUBSYS>_ADMIN_EMAIL (sort of gittrac #1414) (By Karen Miller )
creator: matt
